transcript:
about the horses?" he asked, without looking at Pierre. 
"The exchange horses have just come," an- swered the servant. "Will you not rest here?" 
"No, tell them to harness." 
"Can he really be going away and leaving me alone without having told me all, and without promising to help me?" thought Pierre, rising with downcast head; and he began to pace the room, glancing occasionally at the Mason. "Yes, I never thought of it, but I have led a con- temptible and profligate life, though I did
